QuestData.Title: Skywing
QuestData.Description: Skywing flutters around you.$b$bYou get the feeling he wants you to follow him.
QuestData.LogDescription: Escort Skywing and report to Rilak the Redeemed in Shattrath City.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Return to Rilak the Redeemed in the Lower City section of Shattrath City.
QuestData.RewardText: Alas, poor Skywing was under the dreaded curse of Luanga the Imprisoner!$b$bSkywing traveled to Veil Shalas to attempt to sway others in seeing the way of the Light. They didn't take lightly to his actions, especially sitting on the doorstep of Skettis.$b$bLuanga was one of Terokk's most feared agents. You have done well by freeing Skywing! I thank you.
